overview: Worried, anxious, afraid, stressed, feeling guilty, just at home? You are not alone in living it.  ⁣  The film Sepuluh Meter (Every 10 Meters) comes from the anxiety that we both experience in the midst of uncertain situations. The restlessness felt by Ringgo Agus Rahman and the support of his friend Nirina Zubir, represent the feelings we all experience when we are just at home.⁣⁣⁣
title: Every 10 Meters
